BlackBox.name: Clash.Xilinx.DDR.iddr
BlackBox.type:
iddr
  :: ( HasCallStack               -- ARG[0]
     , KnownConfi~ fast domf      -- ARG[1]
     , KnownConfi~ slow doms      -- ARG[2]
     , KnownNat m )               -- ARG[3]
  -> Clock slow                   -- ARG[4]
  -> Reset slow                   -- ARG[5]
  -> Enable slow                  -- ARG[6]
  -> Signal fast (BitVector m)    -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal slow (BitVector m,BitVector m)

BlackBox.name: Clash.Xilinx.DDR.oddr#
BlackBox.type:
oddr#
  :: ( KnownConfi~ fast domf      -- ARG[0]
     , KnownConfi~ slow doms      -- ARG[1]
     , KnownNat m )               -- ARG[2]
  => Clock slow                   -- ARG[3]
  -> Reset slow                   -- ARG[4]
  -> Enable slow                  -- ARG[5]
  -> Signal slow (BitVector m)    -- ARG[6]
  -> Signal slow (BitVector m)    -- ARG[7]
  -> Signal fast (BitVector m)
